snippet: *...Air Maintenance Estonia and AS Panaviatic Maintenance, both based in Tallinn Airport, provide MRO services for aircraft, largely expanding their operations in recent years....
*...The Lennart Meri Tallinn Airport is about 4 kilometres (2 miles)  from Town Hall square (Raekoja plats)....

properties.name_location: Great Guild Hall, 17, Pikk, Vanalinn, Kesklinna linnaosa, Tallinn, Harju maakond, 10123, Estonia
snippet: *...One of the most visited historical museums in Tallinn is the Estonian History Museum, located in Great Guild Hall at Vanalinn, the old part of the city....

properties.name_location: Hotel Viru, 4, Viru väljak, Südalinn, Kesklinna linnaosa, Tallinn, Harju maakond, 10111, Estonia
snippet: *...Not far away is another museum related to the Soviet occupation of Estonia, the KGB Museum, which occupies the 23rd floor of Sokos Hotel Viru....

properties.name_location: Kadriorg Palace, 37, August Weizenbergi, Kadriorg, Kesklinna linnaosa, Tallinn, Harju maakond, 15050, Estonia
snippet: *...Those who are interested in Western European and Russian art may enjoy Kadriorg Art Museum collections, located in Kadriorg Palace, a beautiful Baroque building erected by Peter the Great....

*...The eastern parts of the city, notably Pirita (with Pirita Convent) and Kadriorg (with Kadriorg Palace) districts, are also popular destinations, and the Estonian Open Air Museum in Rocca al Mare, west of the city, preserves aspects of Estonian rural culture and architecture....

*...Kadriorg Palace, the former palace of Peter the Great, built just after the Great Northern War, now houses the foreign art department of the Art Museum of Estonia, the presidential residence and the surrounding grounds include formal gardens and woodland....

properties.name_location: Tallinn, 11, Kullassepa, All-linn, Kesklinna linnaosa, Tallinn, Harju maakond, 10146, Estonia
snippet: ...Tallinn Old Town is one of the best-preserved medieval cities in Europe and is listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site....
...What can arguably be considered to be Tallinn's main attractions are located in the Tallinn Old Town (divided into a "lower town" and Toompea hill) which is easily explored on foot....
...The Old Town became a World Heritage Site in 1997, and the city hosted the 2002 Eurovision Song Contest....
...The museum is located in the Old Town, inside one of Tallinn's former defensive structures – Fat Margaret's Tower....
*...Another historical museum that can be found at city's Old Town, just behind the Town Hall, is Tallinn City Museum....
*...The city is also home to Estonian Museum of Natural History and the Museum of Health Care, both located in Old Town....
*...Tallinn Old Town is one of the best-preserved medieval cities in Europe and is listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site....

properties.name_location: Toompea Castle, 1a, Lossi plats, Vanalinn, Kesklinna linnaosa, Tallinn, Harju maakond, 15165, Estonia
snippet: *...The major attractions are the medieval Toompea Castle (today housing the Estonian Parliament, the Riigikogu), the Lutheran St Mary's Cathedral, also known as the Dome Church (Estonian: Toomkirik), and the Russian Orthodox Alexander Nevsky Cathedral....

properties.name_location: Town Hall Square, Dunkri, All-linn, Kesklinna linnaosa, Tallinn, Harju maakond, 10146, Estonia
snippet: ...Major sights include the Town Hall square (Estonian: Raekoja plats), the city wall and towers (notably "Fat Margaret" and "Kiek in de Kök") as well as a number of medieval churches, including St Olaf's, St. Nicholas' and the Church of the Holy Ghost....
*...The Lennart Meri Tallinn Airport is about 4 kilometres (2 miles)  from Town Hall square (Raekoja plats)....

properties.name_location: Tallinn TV Tower, 58а, Kloostrimetsa tee, Kloostrimetsa, Pirita linnaosa, Tallinn, Harju maakond, 15026, Estonia
snippet: ...Many buildings, such as the Tallinn TV Tower, "Olümpia" hotel, the new Main Post Office building, and the Regatta Centre, were built for the Olympics....
...Two kilometres inland are the Botanic Gardens and the Tallinn TV Tower....
